title: Enums [2]
description: Make a func checkState function that takes an enum variable and returns nothing, switches on the var on the status enum, and on ok prints "All good", on ERROR prints "ERROR:" and on TIMEOUT prints "Timeout error".
expectedOutput:
PASS: maxOf(3, 7) == 7
PASS: maxOf(2.5f, 1.5f) == 2.5
PASS: maxOf(4.0, 4.5) == 4.5
hint: You can make a switch on a enum with switch(enumvar) and each case is an enumstate. You can return nothign on a function with ret type null
